name: David Ramirez
text: I was going to say we could both get bikes then use them at UP on weekends, then I thought about having to oil and maintain the bike myself and occassionally the chain will come off and require some monkeying around, and I'd have to either get a bike rack for the car  or tie the bike onto the roof of the CRV each time I want to do this... and I thought, hey Roy, after I get back from my trip, want to meet on weekends to run at UP?  =P      Running==[less hassle] and cheaper
